TopicTitle: A tool to make easier for users to detect, fix and eventually report probelms

Articles.Content:
While talking about problems that happens when updating KSP and how KSPe, besides being a decent miner's canary to detect such mishaps, is not the tool we need for this, I started up a discussion about some crazy tools I do on UNIX to make my life easier on KSP.

Link to the starting point:

I see your doing hard work on your KJR fork. I hope you don't mind I go test it with WorldStabilizer or is this known to be an issue or not working together?

Regards
